code: import axios from"axios";const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||"https://flow-crm-backend.onrender.com/api";console.log("ðŸš€ API Base URL at runtime:",API_BASE_URL);const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL,headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}});api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");if(token)config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);return config;});export default api;
